ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Have a thought
ygData.msgSnippet: Selling Rebreathers for 2500p is mad. Sure you get em sold, and it is a way of keeping afloat as those who have plat to spare want to sell em off as fast as
ygData.messageBody:
Selling Rebreathers for 2500p is mad. Sure you get em sold, and it is a way
of keeping "afloat" as those who have plat to spare want to sell em off as
fast as they can to tinker more. I am at the stage where I can do
rebreathers, but I fail a LOT still. Some ppl on my server has been selling
off rebreathers from 7-10kpp which is defenitly too much IMO. I was
auctioning them for 3.5k which I thought was too low but I thought was the
goin price, now ppl tell me to sell them for no less than 5kp, so that is
what I will charge for them, might go down to 4 or 4.5 if they buy more than
one, or return me an aqualung as a part deal.

With a 50% failure rate, a rebreather would cost 1900p to make, at least for
me, if you succeed on both lungs, sell em for 2500 and you make a measly
600p profit. I have skill of 118 now, and it cost me nearly 28k to get there
(i know, i have been doin something wrong somewhere probably, eheh) and with
a 600p profit on each rebreather I'll never get that money back. I think 5kp
for a rebreather is a decent price...

-Sandortien
